title: Best-ever apple cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '125g unsalted butter or margarine', '125g caster sugar', '3 eggs', 'salt', '4 drops lemon extract', '200g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '4 tablespoons milk', '3 apples - peeled, cored and sliced', 'For the topping', '2 to 3 tablespoons apricot jam, melted', 'icing sugar', 'lemon juice']
